title: [1.8][256/128/64X] INKLINATION 矢量风材质!
author: sENcRAFT
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sENcRAFT 于 2014-12-26 18:50 编辑 

 INKLINATION 矢量风材质        
 材质介绍
线条流畅整齐,纹理以几何方式展示,喜欢红石的玩家可以试试这个材质包
该材质还获得了SimplePackShowDown2比赛的季军
[这比赛好像是MineCraftFroum举办的简单材质设计比赛]


材质展示 
    


更新日志
10/04/14
added all 1.8 items and blocks
added some aditional animated textures
使用条款
Gold: A strict level of security. Having this on your pack indicates that your textures can only be used after written permission is obtained from the creator of the pack. It also indicates that adfly links on remixes are never acceptable, under any circumstances.

What you CAN do:
Make videos with this pack in use. You must place the full name of the pack in the video description, as well as a link to this thread (this is so the video shows as a result when people search Google for this texture pack). Monetization of videos is allowed.Use this pack as your server's official texture pack. Please contact me for a direct download link. Do not host the pack yourself.Edit these textures for your own personal use (no distribution).Take and share images of the pack in use in the game. Please place the full name of the pack somewhere on the page, as well as a link to this thread (this is so the image shows as a result when people search Google for this texture pack). Monetization of images you created is allowed.Link directly to the download for this texture pack. Please use one of these URLs, as they are always up-to-date.
What you CAN'T do:
Redistribute this pack or any individual textures, in original or edited form, without my express written consent. Meaning, I have to personally give you the go-ahead before you can distribute any of my work.




 安装方法
1.下载你想要的像素[本材质包含64X64  128X128 256X256
2.把材质包放到.minecraft/resourcepacks/里
3.启动游戏,选择相对应的材质


 下载地址
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dDF4w4x
{:10_492:}你们的人气是我搬运的动力~ 第一次搬运 排版好丑....不要介意 材质好看就行了233 
最后感谢作者:SAMOHTJ
